short_summary: Request for Proposal for the redevelopment of La Camarine and L'echouerie parking lots
description: RFP for the redevelopment of La Camarine and L'echouerie parking lots located in Rserve nationale de faune (RNF) de la Pointe-de-l' est, Grosse-cel, Qu.bec G4T 6B5. All details related are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
=============== ### EE520-230831: Reconfiguration of the Camarine and Échouerie Parking Lot #### Solicitation Overview The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues a REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the reconfiguration of the parking lots at La Camarine and L'Échouerie in Réserve nationale de faune (RNF) de la Pointe-de-l'est, Grosse-Île, Québec G4T 6B5. #### Tender Details * **Tender reference number:** WS3637950777- Doc3644391410 * **Publication date:** 2022-09-13 * **Closing date:** 2022-09-28 14:00:00 EDT (Noted amendment: All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive) * **Expected contract start date:** None * **Expected contract end date:** 2022-12-31 * **Tender status:** Expired #### Solicitation Procedure * The PSPC employs a competitive, open bidding method for this tender. * Selection criteria: Lowest Price #### Contracting and End-User Information * Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) * Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada * End User Entity: Ministry of the Environment (ECCC), 200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 4C6, Canada #### Contact Information * Contact Name: Julien Ratte * Contact Email: [julien.ratte](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) * Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14088768 #### Notes * This tender replaces the closing time for the initial publication. All required supporting documentation and bid submission should be submitted on or before 14:00 HAE, September 28 2022.
Please refer to the full solicitation for complete details.
In this output, I removed any extraneous data and introduced the correct formatting in markdown sections. This rendition of the text clearly presents the necessary details in a user-friendly structure, with
